description.en: Cute Pig that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.ar: Cute Pig that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.br: Um lindo Porquinho que segue seu dono e coleta itens caídos.
description.cns: 可爱的小猪跟随它的主人并捡起周围掉落的物品。
description.de: Ein Schwein, das seinem Herrchen folgt und Gegenstände aufsammelt.
description.fi: Cute Pig that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.fil: Cute Pig that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.fr: invoque un petit cochon qui suit son maître et ramasse les objets laissés par les ennemis
description.id: Baby Pig imut yang setia mengikuti pemiliknya berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang drop.
description.it: Cute Pig that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.jp: レルエンピッグを召喚し、ドロップしたアイテムを拾ってくれる収集ペット
description.kr: 귀여운 꽃돼지를 소환하거나 해제합니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.

description.vi: Heo dễ thương theo chủ nhân của nó xung quanh và nhặt các vật phẩm bị đánh rơi.
